array.item: 好。Hǎo. Good, okay.
不好。Bù hǎo. Not good, not okay.
好不好？Hǎo bù hǎo? Okay?
很好。Hěn hǎo. Very good.
你好。Nǐ hǎo. Hello.
你好吗？Nǐ hǎo ma? Are you well?
你们好。Nǐ men hao. Hi, guys.
你们好吗？Nǐ men hǎo ma? Are you guys well?
我很好。Wǒ hěn hǎo. I am very good.
我们很好，谢谢。Wǒ men hěn hǎo, xiè xie. We are very good, thanks.
我们在哪儿？Wǒ men zài nǎ’er? Where are we?
我们在饭店。Wǒ men zài fàn diàn. We are at a restaurant.
你吃什么？Nǐ chī shén me? What are you eating?
我吃米饭，你呢？Wǒ chī mǐ fàn, nǐ ne? I am eating rice, what about you?
我不想吃。Wǒ bù xiǎng chī. I do not want to eat.
你喝水吗？Nǐ hē shuǐ ma? Are you drinking water?
我不喜欢水。Wǒ bù xǐ huan shuǐ. I do not like water.
我喝茶。Wǒ hē chá. I am drinking tea.
这是什么菜？Zhè shì shén me cài? What dish is this?
这是水果，它很好吃！Zhè shì shuǐ guǒ, tā hěn hǎo chī! This is fruit, it is very delicious!
我叫鲁迅。Wǒ jiào Lǔ Xùn. My name is Lu Xun.
你叫什么名字？Nǐ jiào shén me míng zì？ What is your name?
我喜欢你的名字。Wǒ xǐ huān nǐ dí míng zì. I like your name.
你住在哪儿？Nǐ zhù zài nǎ ér？Where do you live?
我住在中国。Wǒ zhù zài Zhōng Guó. I live in China.
我爱中国。Wǒ ài Zhōng Guó. I love China.
我爸爸是中国人。Wǒ bà bà shì Zhōng Guó rén. My father is Chinese.
他妈妈是老师。Tā mā mā shì lǎo shī. His mother is a teacher.
她会说汉语。Tā huì shuō hàn yǔ. She can speak Chinese.
中国人都会说汉语。Zhōng Guó rén duō huì shuō hàn yǔ. Chinese people can all speak Chinese.
